description: ART_APP_ORIG_SYS_XREF Reference key to application id of legacy system and it is used for converting accounts from other system
ART_SEQ Sequence Id For Account Payment Change Schedule
ART_FREQ Reference key to lookup payment change frequency type such as TERM
ART_NO_OF_ADJUSTMENTS The number of adjustments that should take place for particular frequency
ART_PERIOD Stores the period between subsequent payment change based on payment adjustment frequency
ART_OPTION_TYPE The identifier for the repayment type such as STEP UP  STEP DOWN or BULLET
